name: ClinicalImpressionStatusReason
title: ClinicalImpression Status Reason
description: Example codes indicating the reason why a ClinicalImpression is on hold or stopped. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

contains.display: Left care setting having refused treatment
Consent declined for examination of cardiovascular system
Consent declined for examination of central nervous system
Consent declined for examination of gastrointestinal system
Consent declined for examination of genitourinary system
Consent declined for examination of musculoskeletal system
Consent declined for examination of respiratory system
